attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the signing of the Lisbon treaty the UK Parliment no longer has a function and should be disbanded in favour of local councils and EU rule, thus pushing the UK into the heart of europe and saving the cost of MP's, Lords and Civil Servants from the public purse

rejection.details: The PM does not have the power to disband Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
